Analysis of the statement: The expert likely analyzed the specific claim made by Rick Perry regarding the HPV vaccine and the age group involved. They would have examined the language used and the context in which the statement was made.
Examination of supporting evidence: The expert would have looked for any evidence or data that supports or contradicts the claim. This could include scientific studies, medical guidelines, or statements from other experts in the field.
Evaluation of credibility: The expert would have assessed the credibility of the sources and individuals involved in the claim. They may have looked at the qualifications and expertise of Rick Perry and any other individuals or organizations mentioned.
Comparison with existing knowledge: The expert would have compared the claim to existing knowledge and information on the topic. They may have considered previous research, medical guidelines, and public health policies to determine the validity of the claim.
